# -------------------------------------------
# Setup
## Load Packages
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(rstan)
library(hBayesDM)
library(bayesplot)
library(here)
library(miscTools)
library(wBoot)
library(cmdstanr)
library(loo)
```



# -------------------------------------------
# S-IGT
```{r}
orl_fit = readRDS(here("1_SIGT_PP", "Data", "2_Fitted", "ORL",
                       "orl_pp_fit.rds"))
orl_playfic_fit = readRDS(here("1_SIGT_PP", "Data", "2_Fitted", "ORL_updatedfic",
                               "orl_pp_updatedfic_fit.rds"))
orl_playupdate_fit = readRDS(here("1_SIGT_PP", "Data", "2_Fitted", "ORL_playupdate",
                                  "orl_playupdate_pp_fit.rds"))
orl_playupdate_modifiedK_fit = readRDS(here("1_SIGT_PP", "Data", "2_Fitted", "ORL_playupdate_modifiedK",
                                            "orl_playupdate_modifiedK_pp_fit.rds"))
```



```{r}
log_lik_orl = extract_log_lik(orl_fit)
log_lik_orl_playfic = extract_log_lik(orl_playfic_fit)
log_lik_orl_playupdate = extract_log_lik(orl_playupdate_fit)
log_lik_orl_playupdate_modifiedK = extract_log_lik(orl_playupdate_modifiedK_fit)
```



```{r}
loo_orl = loo(log_lik_orl)
loo_orl_playfic = loo(log_lik_orl_playfic)
loo_orl_playupdate = loo(log_lik_orl_playupdate)
loo_orl_playupdate_modifiedK = loo(log_lik_orl_playupdate_modifiedK)
```



```{r}
comparison = loo_compare(list("orl" = loo_orl,
                              "orl_playfic" = loo_orl_playfic,
                              "orl_playupdate" = loo_orl_playupdate,
                              "orl_playupdate_modifiedK" = loo_orl_playupdate_modifiedK))

print(comparison, simplify = F)
```
